short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aggregate browser working session into a single manageable application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Onemark for Chrome is an extension that compliments the Onemark App. The Onemark App is a browser independent solution that presents captured sites in an organized and searchable view. The App is open source and its releases can be found at https://github.com/rabadiw/onemark/releases. Select the setup for your system, download then install.

...and most of all, Enjoy!
